Title: Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend?
Writer: R.L. Stine (based on the book by), Rich Correll (screenplay by)
Actors: Bella Thorne, Ryan Ochoa, Roshon Fegan, Madison Pettis
Plot: Bella Thorne (Shake It Up!, Frenemies), Madison Pettis (Lab Rats, Beverly Hills Chihuahua 3) and Ryan Ochoa (Pair of Kings, The Perfect Game) lead an ensemble cast in this spook-tacular ...
